Title: Prisoner
Writer: Pete McTighe, Reg Watson (creator), Anthony Ellis (script executive)
Actors: Danielle Cormack, Pamela Rabe, Kate Atkinson, Celia Ireland
Plot: Against Vera wishes, Ferguson is released into general population. The women are out for blood but Vera confines Ferguson to her cell for safety reasons. As always, Ferguson has an end game but will she live to accomplish it?
